Title: Readme for run_analysis.R

The run_analysis.R does the following
1. Download the dataset
2. Load the activity and feature info
3. Merge the test and train datasets 
4. Keep only those columns which reflect a mean or standard deviation
5. Create a tidy dataset that consists of the average (mean) value of each variable for each subject and activity pair.
6. Show the end result in TidyDataSet.txt file.
